name: parseXml
description: Parses data as XML. Can parse @rawstring or a specified field into XML. If the field doesn't exist, the event is skipped. Behavior for non-XML data depends on the strict parameter.

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: The field containing XML data to parse. Defaults to @rawstring if not specified

parameters.name: strict
parameters.description: Controls behavior when field contains non-XML data

examples:
#event_simpleName=ScheduledTaskRegistered
| parseXml(field=TaskXml)
| Task.Principals.Principal.UserId=*
| Task.Principals.Principal.UserId!=/^S-1-5-(18|20)$/
| select([aid, UserName, TaskName, TaskExecArguments, Task.Principals.Principal.RunLevel, Task.Principals.Principal.UserId, Task.Settings.Hidden, Task.Settings.Priority])
notes: Events are skipped if the specified field doesn't exist. Use strict parameter to control error handling for invalid XML.
